I also found myself a bit empty as I had no idea how he got himself in the predicament in the first place. Odd ending, but that was OK, sort of. We had sailboats for years and I related to the sailing part of it. Never been lost myself, but was in some pretty foggy weather. Review Title: but was in some pretty foggy weather Rating: 3.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Review Date: 2014/07/03 Average Rating: 4.7 Product Details: {'Content advisory': ['Nudity', 'violence', 'substance use', 'alcohol use', 'smoking', 'foul language', 'sexual content'], 'Audio languages': ['English Dialogue Boost: High', 'English', 'English [Audio Description]', 'English Dialogue Boost: Medium'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Jean-Marc Vallee'], 'Producers': ['Robbie Brenner', 'Rachel Winter'], 'Starring': ['Matthew McConaughey', 'Jennifer Garner', 'Jared Leto'], 'Studio': ['Universal City Studios Product']} Review Text: I did not even get past the graphic sex part in the beginning. I was told to watch it through that to get the feeling for where he came from. OK, I just complained about not knowing the history of All is Lost so which way do I want it? Hmmm. OK, I will probably watch it all the way through, but for now I did not like it. Review Title: I may change my mind on this one. My spouse and I totally enjoyed renting it. I like these kinds of movies and this one was a winner for us. Review Title: This was a wonderful movie. My spouse and I totally enjoyed renting ... It was well done. Russell Crowe usually does good work. It held my interest and I leaned more about WWI. The father's journey was most interesting. Some violence, but it was a war story. Review Title: This was a very good movie. It was well done Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Review Date: 2015/08/30 Average Rating: 4.7 Product Details: {'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['John Madden'], 'Producers': ['John Madden', 'Graham Broadbent', 'Peter Czernin', 'Michael Dreyer', 'Edward Gomez', 'Robert Lopez Gonzales', 'Jonathan King', 'Tabrez Noorani', 'Denis Pedregosa', 'Pravesh Sahni'], 'Starring': ['Judi Dench', 'Maggie Smith', 'Bill Nighy'], 'Studio': ['Fox Searchlight']} Review Text: We had seen the first Marigold Hotel movie and loved that. It was fun to see everyone again with a sequel. It was a happy movie and greatly enjoyed. Review Title: We had seen the first Marigold Hotel movie and loved that. It was fun to see everyone again ... Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Review Date: 2015/08/30 Average Rating: 4.8 Product Details: {'Content advisory': ['Violence', 'alcohol use', 'smoking'], 'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Simon Curtis'], 'Producers': ['David M. Thompson', 'Kris Thykier'], 'Starring': ['Ryan Reynolds', 'Helen Mirren', 'Katie Holmes'], 'Studio': ['Lionsgate']} Review Text: This was so well done. I enjoyed it from beginning to end. It was another wonderful story from WWII. A woman who would not give up despite the government, as usual, thwarting the effort to retrieve something stolen from the family. The acting was superb. It was intriguing. Great movie. Review Title: I enjoyed it from beginning to end Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Review Date: 2017/08/24 Average Rating: 4.5 Product Details: {'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Eric S. Smith'], 'Producers': ['Natalia Baldwin León', 'Julie Insogna', 'Seth Jarrett', 'Jennifer L. Rettig', 'Erin Shockey', 'Rick Van Meter', 'Donnie Wahlberg', 'Robert Wahlberg', 'Tim Davis'], 'Studio': ['TNT']} Review Text: I enjoy realistic shows and this was excellent. Police are getting a bad rap and this shows they are caring people
willing to keep our streets safe. Review Title: I enjoy realistic shows and this was excellent Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Review Date: 2017/08/24 Average Rating: 4.4 Product Details: {'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Eric S. Smith'], 'Producers': ['Natalia Baldwin León', 'Julie Insogna', 'Seth Jarrett', 'Jennifer L. Rettig', 'Erin Shockey', 'Rick Van Meter', 'Donnie Wahlberg', 'Robert Wahlberg', 'Tim Davis'], 'Studio': ['TNT']} Review Text: See review for Season 2. Excellent. Narrated by Danny Wahlburg. I did not know that he was in the singing group that Daniel Seavey sang with in the next to last American Idol. Plus he is in Blue Bloods. Outstanding man. Review Title: Excellent. Narrated by Danny Wahlburg Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Leslie Sansone: Belly, Buns, & Thighs Slimdown - Walk Your Way Thin Review Date: 2018/11/15 Store: Leslie Sansone (Actor, Director) Rated: NR Format: DVD Categories: Movies & TV, Genre for Featured Categories, Exercise & Fitness Product Description: ["You don't have to spend hours in the gym to get leaner, trimmer or stronger. Join Leslie Sansone in this exciting new program and take your walk to the next level. This 3 Mile Walk workout uses the Fit Cuff resistance tubes at the end of the walk for standing exercises that tone the lower body! A special segment follows the walk using the Fit Cuff with floor exercises for sculpting the muscles of the lower body. You will trim your thighs and firm your backend... fast! Bonus Cut: Flat Tummy - Healthy Back! In just minutes you ll learn the best exercises to flatten the tummy and get a healthy back! All of our famous features of Walk at Home workouts are in this program: Gentle Warm Up Walk; Brisk 4 and 5 mile per hour pace; Mile Markers allow you to choose 1, 2, or 3 Miles; Multi-Muscle Movements; Compound exercises for a bigger calorie burn; Easy Cool Down Walk; Stretch for a healthy end to your walk."] Average Rating: 4.4 Product Details: {'Genre': 'Exercise & Fitness', 'Format': 'Dolby, NTSC', 'Contributor': 'Leslie Sansone', 'Language': 'English', 'Number Of Discs': '1', 'MPAA rating': 'NR (Not Rated)', 'Product Dimensions': '0.7 x 7.5 x 5.4 inches; 2.01 Ounces', 'Director': 'Leslie Sansone', 'Media Format': 'Dolby, NTSC', 'Run time': '1 hour and 11 minutes', 'Release date': 'September 25, 2018', 'Actors': 'Leslie Sansone', 'Studio': 'Bayview Films', 'Number of discs': '1'} Review Text: I did your earlier videos and then fell off exercise. Age + laziness set in. I needed to lose weight as my BP was out of sight. Walking outside in WA state is tough with the rain. I have a treadmill in the garage and was dreadfully bored. I pulled out Leslie's old videos. I decided to look at her new items. I ordered several and have been amazing surprised at what she is doing now!!! I am excited about the purchases and have been doing them everyday and eating better. It is still early but I am focused and excited exercising with the people in the DVDs. Somehow it is better than walking alone outside or on the treadmill. I will throw those two in from time to time. I was excited to see the 80-year-old doing it with the group!!! I turn 80 in Feb and can still do all the videos so far. My daughter, who is a nurse, says I am in better shape than many of her 60-year-old patients in the cardiac floor. This despite taking a long hiatus from doing exercise and eating right. I am back in the saddle and loving Leslie. Great job, Leslie Review Title: Bravo Leslie Sansone Rating: 5.0 --------------------------------------------------

raw_response:
SUMMARY:
This individual demonstrates a strong preference for high-quality, engaging cinematic experiences, indicated by consistently high ratings (4.5 to 5.0) across various genres, particularly in drama, animation, and historical films. Their reviews reveal a sentiment for narrative depth and emotional resonance, with a tendency to appreciate movies that provide a sense of connection, entertainment, and occasionally, historical context.

Common themes in their selections include a fondness for animated features and heartwarming storytelling, revealing a nostalgic or child-like enjoyment of these genres. They also show appreciation for well-crafted scripts and strong acting performances, especially in movies that explore complex themes or human resilience.

Quality appears to be prioritized over price, as evidenced by their willingness to engage with multiple high-stakes plots regardless of surrounding content advisories like violence or adult themes. While there is evidence of fluctuating sentiment towards certain graphic content, overall enjoyment seems to outweigh discomfort when the execution is compelling.

Additionally, they exhibit a commitment to fitness and self-improvement, as reflected by their purchase of exercise DVDs, where camaraderie in workouts surfaces as an appealing factor, enhancing motivation.

Ultimately, this person's core preferences align with exploring emotional narratives, embracing whimsical themes through animation, prioritizing quality craftsmanship, and engaging in personal wellness through dynamic exercise experiences.
